actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 19, title 38, United States Code, so as to provide a statutory total disability for insurance purposes to any veteran who has undergone a kidney or heart transplant or anatomical loss or loss of use of both kidneys.

summary.text: Provides a statutory total disability for insurance purposes to any veteran who has undergone a kidney or heart transplant or anatomical loss or loss of use of both kidneys. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 714)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 19, title 38, United States Code, so as to provide a statutory total disability for insurance purposes to any veteran who has undergone a kidney or heart transplant or anatomical loss or loss of use of both kidneys.
